sources.title: The Remake | Full Comedy Drama
sources.description:
**This film is under license from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved**

The Remake - Two actors who originally hooked up during filming in their early 20's find love can be even more complicated the second time around when reunited to star in an updated remake of their earlier film.

2016
Stars: Sally Kellerman, June Lockhart, Timothy Carhart

metadata.Plot: A movie crew travels up north for a weekend of bonding before their next big movie shoot, a remake of the horror classic "Slaughter Camp 13!". Not everybody is happy with this project, ruining the integrity of the original slasher flick, especially a deranged fan who has entered their ranks to make sure This Remake NEVER HAPPENS!
metadata.Actors: Cassy Harlo, Heather Doba, Jessica Hall
